cards.text: When this becomes blocked, put the top card of each opposing champion's deck into your hand. It loses all thresholds.
cards.flavor: When the orcs revealed the existence of Lazgar Chul, the vennen clergy immediately began planning their invasion of Ayotochi.

cards.name: Yazukan
cards.text:
Flight, Lifedrain, Lethal

At the start of your turn, put a random troop in your crypt and each troop with the same name from your crypt into play.
cards.flavor: "I have enslaved death. It serves my will, and my will alone." -Yazukan

cards.name: Zanya Bloodfist
cards.text:
Crush, Speed

When this attacks, troops in your hand get Rage 1.

Assault - When a troop you control attacks, if this is in your hand, this gets Rage 1.
cards.flavor: "Yes, vennen do have hearts. I've torn out and eaten dozens of them." -Zanya Bloodfist

cards.name: Zodiac Crowfeather
cards.text:
Flight

When this enters play, you may have target troop transform into a copy of this.
cards.flavor: The Twelfth Sign has come to pass, just as the Prophecies foretold.
